text: وَلَهُ ٱلْكِبْرِيَآءُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan bagi-Nya-lah keagungan di langit dan bumi, Dialah Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana.
